statements: SELECT * FROM fintech_data_retention_policy;
SELECT client_id, client_name, account_number FROM fintech_data_retention_policy ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, account_number, date_of_creation FROM fintech_data_retention_policy WHERE data_retention_limit > 365;
SELECT client_id, client_name, last_updated FROM fintech_data_retention_policy ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, account_number, date_of_creation FROM fintech_data_retention_policy WHERE client_id = 100;
SELECT client_id, client_name, account_number, date_of_creation FROM fintech_data_retention_policy WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, account_number, last_updated, data_retention_limit FROM fintech_data_retention_policy WHERE client_id > 5 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM fintech_data_retention_policy WHERE account_number BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT client_id, client_name, date_of_creation FROM fintech_data_retention_policy WHERE data_retention_limit > 365 ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, account_number, last_updated FROM fintech_data_retention_policy WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC, client_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fintech_firms;
SELECT firm_name, data_retention_policy FROM fintech_firms WHERE firm_id = 1;
SELECT firm_name, data_retention_policy FROM fintech_firms WHERE data_retention_policy = '7 years';
SELECT firm_id, firm_name FROM fintech_firms WHERE firm_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT guideline_name, description, effective_date FROM regulatory_guidelines WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fintech_firms WHERE firm_id = 1;
SELECT firm_name, data_retention_policy FROM fintech_firms;
SELECT guideline_name, description FROM regulatory_guidelines WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fintech_firms ORDER BY firm_name DESC;
SELECT firm_id, COUNT(*) AS total FROM fintech_firms GROUP BY firm_id HAVING total > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT regulation_name AS name, description AS desc FROM regulations WHERE effective_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND amount <= 500 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM regulations WHERE effective_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '(555)%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT regulatory_compliance.compliance_id, regulation_name, description, date_created FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY date_created ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, full_name FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, customer_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type LIKE '%Savings%' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT log_id, regulation_name, description FROM regulations WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT log_id, action, log_date FROM compliance_logs WHERE regulation_id = 2 ORDER BY log_date ASC;
